name: Under the Sheets
description:
Under the Sheets, where you play a monster hiding under the bed and loves the taste of kids nightmares! Beware the kid's parent, as he will try and soothe the kids back to sleep or kick your butt!

If you can consume 100 terror before the parent can get rid of you , you will be promoted to Monster in the Closet, and win the game!

WASD - move

J - Interact

*Made for Ludum Dare 33 *

Theme:You are the monster
